item.title: Some Notes on Job Searching
item.description: I’ve recently been thinking about how I can improve my job search tactics. There are tons of web sites out there with great advice for job seekers, and some things are just obvious. I’ve decided to jot down some random, and not so random, thoughts of my own about the process (with a focus on the tech industry). Resources Where to find job openings… I’ve actually found the most promising job opportunities on Craigslist.
